welcome_message_body: Welcome to Orpington, a charming town known for its historic architecture, beautiful parks, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Biggin Hill Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at London City Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: North Terminal
terminals.description: The North Terminal at Gatwick Airport is the busier of the two terminals, serving mainly international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: The South Terminal at Gatwick Airport is primarily used for domestic flights and some international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, with a premium option for faster speeds.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used by British Airways and other Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The newest terminal at Heathrow Airport, primarily used by Star Alliance airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: One of the main terminals at Heathrow Airport, used by various airlines including American Airlines, Cathay Pacific, and Emirates.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: The smallest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used by various airlines including KLM, Qatar Airways, and Delta.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: The largest terminal at Heathrow Airport, used exclusively by British Airways.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport, but a premium option is also available for faster speeds.
